item.title: librsvg
item.description: rsvg-convert -w 1024 -h 1024 infile.svg -o outfile.png rsvg-convert -h 1024 suttapitaka.svg -o sutapitaka1024.png

item.title: mobile detection
item.description: const deviceType = () => { const ua = navigator.userAgent; if (/(tablet|ipad|playbook|silk)|(android(?!.*mobi))/i.test(ua)) { return "tablet"; } else if (/Mobile|Android|iP(hone|od)|IEMobile|BlackBerry|Kindle|Silk-Accelerated|(hpw|web)OS|Opera M(obi|ini)/.test(ua)) { return "mobile"; } return "desktop"; };

item.title: node
item.description: Serve app on Github https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yo2bMGnIKE8 export default { base: "/suttapitaka-chart/", } deploy.sh #!/usr/bin/env sh npm run build git add dist -f git commit -m "deploy" git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-page
